data.title: DHAN SEVA MICRO FOUNDATION

data.text:
Directors - DHAN SEVA MICRO FOUNDATION

The company has 4 directors and no reported key management personnel.

The longest serving directors currently on board are Lalit Kumar Singh and Sarita Kumari who were appointed on 22 August, 2022. They have been on the board for 1 years and 11 months. The most recently appointed director is Mahender Gupta, who was appointed on 15 November, 2022.

Lalit Kumar Singh has the largest number of other directorships with a seat at a total of 4 companies. In total, the company is connected to 4 other companies through its directors.

NAME DESIGNATION APPOINTMENT DATE LALIT KUMAR SINGH Director 22 August, 2022 Other directorships - ANMOLSATH NIDHI LIMITED, ANMOLSATH MICROFINANCE FOUNDATION, ALV MICROCARE FOUNDATION, MAHENDER GUPTA Director 15 November, 2022 Other directorships - RAMDARSHAN NIDHI LIMITED, SARITA KUMARI Director 22 August, 2022 Other directorships - ANMOLSATH NIDHI LIMITED, ANMOLSATH MICROFINANCE FOUNDATION, SUNIL KUMAR SHARMA Director 09 October, 2022 No other directorships
